main.title: Bee O’clock
main.description: Bee O’clock is a unique management tool allowing your customers to book and pay for your services. You can also keep track of your performance to become the best version of yourself.
main.keywords: appointment, calendar, clients, business, management, tool, bookkeeping, tax planning, event management, delegate, time-consuming tasks, empower, professionals, reduce stress, increase productivity, eliminate distractions, frustrations, running a business
main.author: Bee O’clock

businessSupport.description: Our product has been praised by businesses that have achieved remarkable growth and success after implementing it

example.description: Curly Barber offers a range of haircuts and grooming services, including beard trims, hot towel shaves, and eyebrow grooming, using high-quality tools and equipment.
example.title: “Bee O’clock has been a life-changer for me”

businessSupport.title: Businesses we support

build.content: Having an Instagram or Facebook page with your work is great. Let’s get you a professional online page now,             so             customers can book and pay for their next appointment with you.
build.title: BUILD

features.description: Boost your business performance with an all-in-one solution

monitor.content: Keep track of previous visits. Get summary results of your monthly performance. Identify your core customers             and             services. Plan your schedule based on busy days and hours statistics. Maximize your efficiency.
monitor.title: MONITOR

organize.content: Keep you personal and professional finances separate. Receive in-app payments before, during, or after             you’ve             given the service, including prepayments.
organize.title: ORGANIZE

plan.content: Don’t get bothered by constant phone calls asking about availability. Focus on what you are good at, and             we’ll             take care of the rest.
plan.title: PLAN

secure.content: We value your time. Select a custom prepayment rate and cancellation policy for each service. Get a no-show             protection if your customer doesn’t show up.
secure.title: SECURE

features.title: Appointments, calendar, and clients on the go

blog.title: FROM THE BLOG

footer.description: Bee O'clock helps professionals focus on their strengths by providing services and tools, such as               bookkeeping, tax planning, and event management, to delegate               time-consuming tasks. Their mission is to empower professionals, reduce stress, and increase productivity               by eliminating distractions and frustrations that come with running a business.
footer.title: OUR MISSION
